bike.description: FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, aero tube shape, compact race design, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: Venge Pro FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ custom integrated top cap
New Specialized ProSet 7075, cone head bolt and plastic clip, 12-degree, 4-degree shim, 31.8mm
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, aramid bead, 127 TPI, 700x23c
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt protection, aramid bead, 127 TPI, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Evo Expert w/ hollow ti rails
Venge Aero, FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
